subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rafael Furcal denied that he reneged on a deal with the Atlanta Braves before agreeing to a contract last week with the Los Angeles Dodgers. “We never gave the nod to the Braves,” he said Sunday after arriving in the Dominican Republic to play winter ball for the Aguilas of Cibaenas.
